titles.title: Child Tax Credit Integrity Preservation Act of 2011
Child Tax Credit Integrity Preservation Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify eligibility for the child tax credit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Child Tax Credit Integrity Preservation Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the identification requirements for the child tax credit to require taxpayers to provide valid identification numbers on their tax returns in addition to the names and identification numbers of each qualifying child.
